nodes.text: const transport: FallbackTransport<readonly [HttpTransport<undefined, false>, HttpTransport<undefined, false>]>

(alias) fallback<readonly [HttpTransport<undefined, false>, HttpTransport<undefined, false>]>(transports_: readonly [HttpTransport<undefined, false>, HttpTransport<undefined, false>], config?: FallbackTransportConfig): FallbackTransport<readonly [HttpTransport<undefined, false>, HttpTransport<undefined, false>]>
import fallback

nodes.docs: Callback on whether an error should throw or try the next transport in the fallback.

Returns true if searchString appears as a substring of the result of converting this
object to a String, at one or more positions that are
greater than or equal to position; otherwise, returns false.
tags: position If position is undefined, 0 is assumed, so as to search all of the String.
